rows.label: qev051402_MSG0001
rows.name: I have been waiting for you, BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0002
rows.name: Forgive my impatience, but what of the operation?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0003
rows.name:
...So these are the schematics for the Ganglion's new
weapon? Excellent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0004
rows.name:
It will require further analysis to be certain of its
specifications, but it appears to be a new form of
artillery with considerable range.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0005
rows.name:
Should they be allowed to complete it,
New LA will no doubt find itself in the crosshairs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0006
rows.name:
We must move quicklyâ€”I shall inform the New LA
authorities at once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0007
rows.name:
As someone who has seen the inside of their fortress,
I would greatly appreciate your insights in this matter.
Will you attend a joint planning meeting?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0008
rows.name:
Report, sir! An armed force believed to be from the
Ganglion is presently marching on our location![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0009
rows.name: The Ganglion? They are after the plans![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0010
rows.name:
...No. They would know it's too late to retrieve them.
Then they either aim to take revenge for the theft,
or else kill all who have seen them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0011
rows.name:
In any case, this just further proves how important the
plans are to them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0012
rows.name:
All the more reason to beat back their advance.
We will defend the information your efforts won us
no matter the cost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0013
rows.name:
I am sorry to have dragged you into a battlefield,
but I would greatly welcome your help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0014
rows.name:
Our main force is unfortunately away fighting the
Ganglion afield, you see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0015
rows.name:
With only the defense platoon present,
our strength is considerably diminished.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0016
rows.name:
Granted, it may well be too late for you to leave
without fighting anyway! Har![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0017
rows.name:
You will find a man named Gi Nogan outside.
I ask that you follow his instructions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0018
rows.name: May victory be ours![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0019
rows.name:
The battle has already begun.
Please head to the front lines at once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0020
rows.name: Ask the one called Gi Nogan to brief you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051402_MSG0021
rows.name: My thanks, good BLADE![ST:wait ]
